items.title: Russian attacks on Ukraine energy sites 'particularly depraved', UK PM Starmer says
items.description: The UK leader's comments came after Russia renewed its attacks on power plants and critical infrastructure in Ukraine.

items.title: Gold rebounds above $5,000 after US downs Iran drone
items.description: Precious metal price voliatility continues as geopolitical tensions push investors to safe-haven assets.

items.title: Snooker legend John Virgo dies aged 79
items.description: John Virgo, who co-presented TV show Big Break and was a popular BBC commentator for decades, has died.

items.title: 'Finally got him to go today': Mandelson's emails to Epstein on Gordon Brown
items.description: Emails released by the US appear to shed new light on the dying days of Gordon Brown's government.
